# MPSAlphaType.premultiplied

**Case**

The image is premultiplied by alpha.

## Declaration

```swift
case premultiplied
```

## Discussion

The image uses premultiplied alpha. Alpha is not guaranteed to be 1.

## Constants

- **MPSAlphaType.nonPremultiplied**: The image is not premultiplied by alpha.
- **MPSAlphaType.alphaIsOne**: Alpha is guaranteed to be 1.

items.description: The image is not premultiplied by alpha.
